title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

**KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat**

**Stay Cozy and Safe with Our Compact Space Heater**

Are you tired of feeling chilly in your home, dorm, office, or kitchen? Look no further! Our KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat is here to provide you with quick, efficient, and safe heat. With its compact design and powerful heating capabilities, this space heater is perfect for small to medium-sized rooms up to 200 square feet.

**Key Features:**

* **Dual Power Options**: Choose between 750W and 1500W heating modes to customize your warmth level.
* **Thermostat**: Maintain a comfortable temperature with our built-in thermostat.
* **Air Circulation Mode**: Use the fan-only mode to circulate air and keep your space feeling fresh.
* **Safety First**: Enjoy peace of mind with our overheat protection and tip-over protection (auto-off at 45-degree angle) features.
* **Rapid Heating**: Warm up your space in just 2 seconds with our PTC ceramic heating element.
* **Quiet Operation**: Our space heater produces a low noise level of below 45 dB, making it perfect for quiet environments.
* **Easy to Use**: Intuitive controls make it simple to adjust the temperature and mode to your liking.
* **Portable and Lightweight**: Weighing only 2.6 pounds, this space heater is easy to move from room to room.

**Specifications:**

* Dimensions: 7.72 inches (W) x 6.38 inches (D) x 9.13 inches (H)
* Weight: 2.6 pounds
* Power Source: Electric
* Certifications: ETL
* Color: Black
* Type: Indoor, Ceramic Portable Heater Fan

**Order Now and Stay Cozy All Year Round!**

**Product Listing:**

**KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat**

**Stay Cozy and Safe with Our Compact Space Heater**

Are you tired of feeling chilly in your home, dorm, office, or kitchen? Look no further! Our KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat is the perfect solution to keep you warm and comfortable. With its compact design and powerful heating capabilities, this space heater is ideal for small to medium-sized spaces up to 200 square feet.

**Key Features:**

* **Adjustable Power**: Choose from two heat settings - 750W or 1500W - to customize your comfort level.
* **Thermostat Control**: Regulate your desired temperature with our intuitive thermostat feature.
* **Safety First**: Enjoy peace of mind with our overheat protection and tip-over protection (auto-off at 45 degrees) features.
* **Rapid Heat Generation**: Feel the warmth in just 2 seconds with our PTC ceramic heating element.
* **Quiet Operation**: Our space heater operates at a whisper-quiet level below 45 dB, ensuring a peaceful environment.
* **Portable and Compact**: Weighing only 2.6 pounds and measuring 7.72 x 6.38 x 9.13 inches, this heater is easy to move and store.
* **Certified and Reliable**: Our product is ETL certified, ensuring safety and quality.

**Additional Benefits:**

* **Low Thermal Resistance**: Our heater is designed to maximize heat delivery while minimizing energy consumption.
* **Intuitive Controls**: Easily adjust settings with our user-friendly interface.
* **Air Circulation Mode**: Use the fan-only mode to circulate air and keep your space comfortable year-round.

**Order Now and Stay Warm and Cozy All Year Round!**

**Product Listing:**

**KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat - 1500W/750W**

Stay warm and cozy with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater, designed to provide efficient and safe heating for your home, dorm, office, or kitchen. This compact and portable heater is perfect for small to medium-sized spaces, with a coverage area of up to 200 square feet.

**Power Options:**

* Low Heat: 750W
* High Heat: 1500W
* Air Circulation: Fan mode for gentle air circulation

**Safety Features:**

* Overheat Protection: Automatically shuts off in case of overheating
* Tip-Over Protection: Shuts off at an angle of 45 degrees to prevent accidents

**Key Features:**

* Compact Design: Measures 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13" and weighs only 2.6 pounds
* Quick Heating: Heats up in just 2 seconds with its PTC ceramic heating element
* Quiet Operation: Runs below 45 dB for a peaceful experience
* Intuitive Controls: Easy-to-use thermostat and controls for precise temperature setting
* Portable: Lightweight and compact design makes it easy to move around
* Low Thermal Resistance: Ensures efficient heat generation and distribution

**Certifications:**

* ETL certified for safety and quality

**Additional Features:**

* Rapid Heat Generation: Quickly warms up your space
* Thermostat: Maintains a consistent temperature for optimal comfort
* Quiet Operation: Runs silently in the background

**Order now and enjoy a warm and cozy winter with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater!**
